item.title: The high-profile BTC ancient whale has once again transferred 1000 BTC to Hyperliquid 20 minutes ago to reallocate into ETH.
item.description: On August 31st, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a highly prominent BTC ancient whale that has been actively swapping ETH recently transferred another 1000 BTC (valued at $108.54 million) to Hyperliquid for another round of ETH swapping, which occurred 20 minutes ago.During the past 8 hours, this whale has deposited a total of 3000 BTC, with a value of $326.78 million, and converted it into ETH.

item.title: Overall Open Interest of WLFI Futures Contracts Surges by 134.46% in 24 Hours, Currently Standing at $1.715 Billion
item.description: On August 31st, the cryptocurrency project of the Trump family, World Liberty Finance (WLFI) token, is set to officially go live tomorrow. In the past 24 hours, the overall trading volume of WLFI futures contracts surged by 134.46% and currently stands at 17.15 billion US dollars. The open interest has increased by 64.92% in the past 24 hours and is now at 7.93 billion US dollars.According to HTX market data, the pre-market price of WLFI (World Liberty Finance) briefly broke through $0.38 and is currently at $0.3781, with a 24-hour increase of more than 39.1%.World Liberty Finance (WLFI) is scheduled to go live on Ethereum on September 1st, with both claiming and trading enabled. Early supporters (at $0.015 and $0.05 rounds) will be able to unlock 20%, and the remaining 80% will be determined by community voting. Tokens held by the founding team, advisors, and partners will not be unlocked. Trading will start at 8 p.m. Beijing time on September 1st, with the start of claiming 20% of

item.title: Shitcoin Season Index Rises to 59
item.description: On August 31st, according to CoinMarketCap data, the Altcoin Season Index has increased to 59. This index indicates that within the past 90 days, approximately 59 projects among the top 100 cryptocurrencies in terms of market capitalization have outperformed Bitcoin.Note: The CMC Cryptocurrency Altseason Index is a real-time indicator employed to determine whether the current cryptocurrency market is in an altcoin-dominated season. This index is based on the performance of the top 100 altcoins in relation to Bitcoin over the past 90 days.

item.title: OKX will list WLFI spot trading and convert pre-market futures into perpetual contracts.
item.description: August 31st. According to an official announcement, OKX is going to list WLFI (World Liberty Financial) and convert WLFI pre-market contracts into standard perpetual contracts. Deposits are now available, and the specific schedule is as follows:· Auction period: 8:00 - 9:00 PM on September 1 (UTC+8)· Spot trading starts: 9:00 PM on September 1 (UTC+8)· Pre-market contract conversion: 10:00 PM on September 1 (UTC+8)

item.title: SharpLink currently holds 797,700 ETH, with an unrealized profit of $753 million.
item.description: On August 31, based on the data from strategicethreserve, SharpLink Gaming (SBET) currently possesses 797,700 ETH, which is approximately worth $3.55 billion. The position has seen a 82% increase in the past 30 days, and there is an unrealized gain of $753 million.

item.title: 10x Research: South Korean Retail Traders Have Already Bought Over $12 Billion Worth of US Crypto Company Stocks This Year
item.description: On August 31st, the data indicates that individual investors in South Korea, who have been actively engaged in cryptocurrency investment, are expanding their investment scope by purchasing a large amount of cryptocurrency-related stocks listed in the US. 10x Research shows that South Korean retail investors have purchased more than $12 billion worth of US stocks in cryptocurrency companies this year, including Bitmine, Circle, and Coinbase.In August alone, South Korean investors bought $426 million worth of Bitmine, $226 million worth of Circle, and $183 million worth of Coinbase stocks. They also bought $282 million worth of a 2x Ethereum ETF. 10x Research points out: "South Korean investors are pouring billions of dollars into cryptocurrency stocks, which is reshaping global fund flows and attracting the attention of Wall Street. The stablecoin legislation in the US and South Korea has also provided a strong background for this wave of capital inflow."This trend is different from

item.title: California Governor Plans to Launch "Trump Corruption Coin" to Criticize Trump's Controversial Actions in the Cryptocurrency Space
item.description: On August 31st, as per Cointelegraph, California Governor Gavin Newsom recently disclosed plans to initiate a cryptocurrency named the "Trump Corruption Coin." This was done in direct response to Donald Trump's controversial actions within the crypto space, particularly in the Meme coin sector.Gavin Newsom, during an appearance on the "Pivot" podcast, stated that this Meme coin, which is named after Trump's alleged scandals, is part of his broader "Campaign for Democracy" initiative. The funds raised through this coin will be utilized for redistricting and voter outreach efforts.Gavin Newsom said in the interview, "We are on the verge of launching a meme coin. Trump, let's see which coin, yours or ours, gains more popularity." When asked if it would be called "Gavin Coin," he responded, "No, it is called the Trump Corruption Coin."He further added, "We merely aim to intensify the heat and make people aware of the absurdity of this situation." Gavin Newsom referred to Trump as "on

item.title: A whale deposited $5.96 million into HyperLiquid and went long on SOL and HYPE.
item.description: On August 31, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale deposited 5.96 million USDC into HyperLiquid and established a 20x leveraged long position on SOL and a 10x leveraged long position on HYPE.

item.title: Canary CEO: XRP Recognition on Wall Street Second Only to Bitcoin, XRP Demand Could Soar After ETF Launch
item.description: On August 31st, Steven McClurg, the CEO of Canary Capital, stated that the level of recognition of XRP among Wall Street professionals is second only to Bitcoin. If an XRP ETF receives approval from the US SEC, market demand could experience a significant surge.It is reported that Canary Capital submitted a spot XRP ETF registration application in October of the previous year, and it has not yet obtained regulatory approval.

item.title: WLFI Pre-market Price Surges Above $0.36, Up Over 30% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 31st, according to HTX market data, the pre-market price of WLFI (World Liberty Financial) exceeded $0.36 and is currently trading at $0.3602, with a more than 30% increase within the past 24 hours.According to Coinglass data, the total open interest of WLFI futures contracts across all exchanges is currently $7.38 billion, showing a 53.19% increase in the past 24 hours. The trading volume in the last 24 hours is $13.97 billion, with a rise of 89.145%. The current aggregated long-to-short ratio across all exchanges is 1.BlockBeats previously reported that the Trump family's project, World Liberty Finance (WLFI), is scheduled to launch on Ethereum on September 1st, with open claiming and trading. Early supporters (at the $0.015 and $0.05 rounds) will unlock 20%, while the remaining 80% will be determined through community voting.
